remarks: Implicit substitution of ` y ` for ` x ` and ` t ` for ` z ` into a theorem.  (Contributed by BJ, 17-Oct-2019.)
statement:
ch2var.nfx $e |- F/ x ps $.
ch2var.nfz $e |- F/ z ps $.
ch2var.maj $e |- ( ( x = y /\ z = t ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ch2var.min $e |- ph $.
ch2var $p |- ps $.
$d t x $.
$d x z $.
